short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Eliminate duplicates & improve data quality like never before

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage your Salesforce's CRM data like never before, prevent and eliminate your duplicates en masse and automatically. 

ğŸ’The app can ensure that non-duplicated phone numbers from duplicate contacts are not lost; instead, it can automatically keep them in different phone fieldsğŸ’

ğŸ‘The app offers a wide array of data management features such as mass merge, scheduled merge, Mass Actions, Mass emails, Undo merge, Excel-Like experience for grids, maps, and more. The app is compatible with any Salesforce version (classic & lightning) and can handle any Salesforce object. ğŸ‘

ğŸMain Features ğŸ
âœ” Mass Merge: Merge multiple records into multiple-uniques, keep key data and related information (combine / copy if empty / merge and copy into field/keep all phones/ keep all emails). 
âœ” ğŸ¥ŠAuto Merge, Scheduled Merge Jobs and reports: run daily / hourly / automatically, works with any object (custom objects, opportunity, cases, etc)
âœ” Selective-Merge
âœ” ğŸ¥ŠBulk Actions: Mass Merge, Mass Update, Mass Delete, Mass Clone, Mass create, Mass convert, Mass Inline Edit, Mass Format (lowercase/proper case/etc), Mass Find and Replace, Mass Editor, ETL. 
âœ” ğŸ’ªExcel-like experience for tabs, grids, and related lists; can be used to manage forecasts
âœ” Auto lead conversion - auto convert based on matched record or condition
âœ” Custom / fuzzy dedupe
âœ” Email validation and verification + bounce detection
âœ” Advanced Import with duplicates avoidance with advanced options i.e. a lot more advance than dataloader
âœ” ğŸŠğŸŒ¿Undo actions, Fast & Easy unmerge records, Audit Logs, Backup filesğŸŠğŸŒ¿
âœ” Search, sorts, filters, groupings
âœ” Smart Related list: ZaapIT's merge & convert related list & field-data (field-combine-rules with merge strategy options). 
âœ” Cross object duplication cleansing: leads & contact, leads & accounts, custom object & custom object (multi-field support).
âœ” Bulk Emails

Main De-duplication Reports / tabs that are available in the app:
âœ” Jobs: scheduled report, custom dedupe, import jobs / daily - hourly jobs / findids, scheduled merge.
âœ” Find matching records - AI based de-duplication report, an admin can generate full duplicates report.
âœ” Similar leads / contacts report - same name / email
âœ” Leads with a Matching Contact or Account: same name/ email / company & account.name
âœ” Merge duplicate for attachments (save space)
